Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Don't you have something better to do rather than staring at me?

Choices.Choice1: I need to ensure the tea quality for our valued guest

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I'm afraid I have to stay, sir.
Speaker.line2: It's our duty to ensure the quality of tea for every passenger.
Speaker.line3: Especially for our valued guest as you.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I'm afraid no can do, sir.
Speaker.line2: We've been instructed to stay until the tea is ready.
Speaker.line3: To be frank, I'm not sure why either.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: I know that I am the most valued guest in here, no need to remind me.
Speaker.line2: But that duty to stay of yours sounds absurd.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line2: Do all middle-class follow orders blindly, or is it just you?
Speaker.line3: But at least you're honest with me, which is good.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: That would save me precious time instead of listening to your blab.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: However, for the sake of your efforts,
Speaker.line2: I'll try to ignore your presence then.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: You should be grateful for that.
Speaker.line2: Otherwise, I would have kicked you out already.
